titleStmt.title: To the memorie of the much honoured, and much lamented Thomas Robertson bailie and builder of Edinburgh; who departed this life; September 22. 1686. A funeral elegie. / N: Paterson.
titleStmt.author: Paterson, Ninian, d. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased, with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
